<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[`DataAdapter`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter.md)

## DataAdapter interface

Work directly with files and folders inside a vault. If possible prefer using the [Vault](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault.md) API over this.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DataAdapter 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [`append(normalizedPath, data, options)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/append.md) | Add text to the end of a plaintext file. |
|  [`copy(normalizedPath, normalizedNewPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/copy.md) | Create a copy of a file. This will fail if there is already a file at <code>normalizedNewPath</code>. |
|  [`exists(normalizedPath, sensitive)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/exists.md) | Check if something exists at the given path. |
|  [`getName()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/getName.md) |  |
|  [`getResourcePath(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/getResourcePath.md) | Returns an URI for the browser engine to use, for example to embed an image. |
|  [`list(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/list.md) | Retrieve a list of all files and folders inside the given folder, non-recursive. |
|  [`mkdir(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/mkdir.md) | Create a directory. |
|  [`process(normalizedPath, fn, options)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/process.md) | Atomically read, modify, and save the contents of a plaintext file. |
|  [`read(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/read.md) |  |
|  [`readBinary(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/readBinary.md) |  |
|  [`remove(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/remove.md) | Delete a file. |
|  [`rename(normalizedPath, normalizedNewPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/rename.md) | Rename a file or folder. |
|  [`rmdir(normalizedPath, recursive)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/rmdir.md) | Remove a directory. |
|  [`stat(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/stat.md) | Retrieve metadata about the given file/folder. |
|  [`trashLocal(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/trashLocal.md) | Move to local trash. Files will be moved into the <code>.trash</code> folder at the root of the vault. |
|  [`trashSystem(normalizedPath)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/trashSystem.md) | Try moving to system trash. |
|  [`write(normalizedPath, data, options)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/write.md) | Write to a plaintext file. If the file exists its content will be overwritten, otherwise the file will be created. |
|  [`writeBinary(normalizedPath, data, options)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/writeBinary.md) | Write to a binary file. If the file exists its content will be overwritten, otherwise the file will be created. |
